item.title: Designing a Theorem Prover, Part 1
item.description: Intro Link to heading I’m going to work through the folderol by Lawrence C Paulson (1990). Automated Theorem Proving Link to heading Ther asfd e are 2 terms that have different meaning: Proof Assistant or Interactive Theorem Prover (wiki) â€“ Assists with the development of formal proofs by human-machine collaboration. Usually in the form of keeping track of what you need to prove and what you have proved. For example: Coq, Lean, Agda, Isabelle, F*.
